successMessage: Selected apps have been successfully uninstalled. Your device now has more free space.
partialSuccessMessage: Operation completed. Some apps could not be uninstalled, check system permissions.
onboardingDesc1: The easiest way to keep your device clean and organized. Easily uninstall unused apps.
onboardingDesc2: Optimize your device's performance and storage by removing unnecessary applications.
onboardingDesc3: Start managing apps on your device right now and get a better user experience.
